doc.field: Food Politics is the blog of Marion Nestle, a New York University Professor of Nutrition, Food Studies, and Public Health. The blog features posts about the global food industry, the impact of food lobbies on industry regulation, and food in popular culture. The blog also features information about Nestle's books and other publications and their press coverage, as well as a calendar of her public appearances and contributions to podcasts and broadcast media.
This series also includes an interview with Marion Nestle with Jane Hutcheon on Australian Broadcasting Corporation (ABC).
Crawl was limited to domains and subdomains of www.foodpolitics.com in order to remain within the collection scope and data constraints.

Due to technical or privacy issues, archived websites may not be exact copies of the original website at the time of the web crawl. Certain file types will not be captured dependent on how they are embedded in the site. Other parts of websites that the crawler has difficulty capturing includes Javascript, streaming content, database-driven content, and highly interactive content. Full-Text searches of archived websites are available at https://archive-it.org/organizations/567.
